title: Stronghold_Crusader_patches_cracks
description:
The latest (as of June 09, 2007) patches and associated cracks for FireFly Studio&#039;s Stronghold and Stronghold Crusader.

The patches are direct from FireFly, you shouldn&#039;t have any trouble installing them provided that you did not crack the games previously (i believe the installer checks the game .exe files)

The cracks are simple. Make a backup copy of "Stronghold.exe" or "Stronghold Crusader.exe" in the games directory, and replace the original from those provided in this torrent.

I have tested these cracks in single-player only, not sure if the GameSpy-enabled Multiplayer mode will function.
